question.short: Is glyphosate harmful to farmworker health?
question.long: Does exposure to glyphosate have negative effects on farmworker health?

description: Results from studies evaluating the impact of glyphosate exposure on farmworker health outcomes.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of glyphosate exposure on farmworker health

no.description: The literature suggests that glyphosate exposure is not harmful to farmworker health

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that glyphosate exposure is probably not harmful to farmworker health, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that glyphosate exposure is likely harmful to farmworker health, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that glyphosate exposure is harmful to farmworker health

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of glyphosate exposure on farmworker health

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of glyphosate exposure on farmworker health, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of glyphosate exposure on farmworker health, but there are mixed results on specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that glyphosate exposure might have an effect on farmworker health, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that glyphosate exposure may be harmful to farmworker health, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that glyphosate exposure may have a small effect on farmworker health

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that glyphosate exposure may be harmful to farmworker health, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that glyphosate exposure is harmful to farmworker health
